snippet.title: Battle Princess Madelyn Teaser #1
snippet.description:
Join Princess Madelyn on a quest to save her family and kingdom from the clutches of evil. Battle through legions of ghouls and demons to avenge your ghostly canine sidekick!

Coming in 2018 to Switch, Wii U, Xbox One, PS4, Vita and Steam for Windows.
